title: Unable to Login Help!
body: My league of legends will not allow me to log into the game because it says "we are unable to log you in because you may be offline." However, I am not offline because everything else is working. So I started trying to fix the problem and I did everything under the sun all they way from restarting my computer, to deleting a line of code that was a common problem with a recent update, to uninstalling and re-installing league of legends. Riot please help!

replies.body: That message isn't so much saying that you might be offline, it's more closely saying your network couldn't reach *our* servers specifically which isn't entirely uncommon. Double check your network settings using [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure there aren't any firewalls blocking your network or ports that need to be opened to allow traffic through.
